::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus finds a good amount of explosives and loads them into a backpack like contraption. He then starts to make his way through the ship, by blowing holes in the walls, not the heavily armored bulkheads. The explosions are heard from all over the base. Eventually Jhiaxus blows the wall out directly in front of Nightlight.

Jhiaxus: Hello, Miss.

He takes aim with his blasters.

Jhiaxus: Maximal femmebots? How worthless! I hope you are honored to meet your own evolution!

       
---------------------------------
